Dental Hygiene App: Create an app that allows users to track their oral hygiene habits, receive reminders for brushing, flossing, and dental check-ups, and connect with local dental professionals for consultations and appointments.

DIY Dental Kit: Develop a kit that includes a set of homemade dental tools, such as a toothpick, floss, and a small mirror, along with instructions on how to use them effectively. This kit can be marketed as a cost-effective alternative to visiting a dentist.

Community Dental Co-ops: Establish community-based dental co-ops where members can share dental resources, such as equipment and expertise, to provide affordable dental care. These co-ops can also offer educational workshops on proper oral hygiene practices.

Mobile Dental Clinics: Convert a mobile home or RV into a fully-equipped dental clinic that can travel to remote areas, providing dental services to people who may not have access to a dentist. This can be done in collaboration with local organizations or governments.

3D Printed Dental Prosthetics: Utilize 3D printing technology to create customized dental prosthetics, such as crowns, bridges, and dentures, that are affordable and accessible to people in need. This can be done in collaboration with dental professionals and 3D printing companies.
